pages.text: The $(thing)Crystal Altar$() is a work station developed by industrious villagers. It allows for the concentration of magical energy in certain basic crystals and other objects without needing to offer any piece of oneself.
pages.unlockDesc: Find some Nether Quartz to unlock this passage!

pages.text: Some special uses for the altar: $(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:spells/spell_scroll)Adding spells to spell scrolls$()$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:trinkets/spellcasters_focus#enhancing_focus_respec)Respecing a Spellcasters Focus$()
